back_text:
困難 / 專家
[skull]：-2. 如果你所在地點已淹沒，reveal an additional chaos token.
[cultist]：-2. 如果你檢定失敗, after this test ends, increase the flood level of your location (if you cannot, 受到1點恐懼 instead).
[tablet]：-3. 如果你檢定失敗 this test and 你所在地點已淹沒，受到2點傷害。
[elder_thing]：-4. Move the nearest unengaged enemy once toward your location. It loses aloof during this movement.
name: A Light in the Fog
text:
簡單 / 普通
[skull]：-1. 如果你所在地點已淹沒，reveal an additional chaos token.
[cultist]：-2. 如果你檢定失敗, after this test ends, increase the flood level of your location.
[tablet]：-3. 如果你檢定失敗 this test and 你所在地點已淹沒，受到1點傷害。
[elder_thing]：-4. 如果你檢定失敗, move the nearest ready unengaged enemy once toward your location. It loses aloof during this movement.

back_flavor:
You don't see the attack coming until it is too late. Just as you round a corner, you are struck across the head and sent reeling. Your ambusher pins you against the wall, his grin full of sharp, jagged teeth. You recognize the repulsive face from your memories.
"It's you again," Oceiros says with a hint of surprise in his croaking voice. "So you're the ones who've been snooping around. No matter. Your meddling ends now."
back_text: 生成放在一邊的Oceiros Marsh enemy engaged with the lead investigator. Place the set-aside blue key on Oceiros Marsh. 將放在一邊的每張Worth His Salt into the encounter deck. 每位調查員 loses each of their clues. 將the set-aside Lighthouse Basement location into play directly below Lighthouse Stairwell. Advance the act directly to act 2a (do not resolve act 1b).
flavor: A curl of mist wraps the lighthouse in an otherworldy veil. The waves lap at the rocks on the shoreline like hungry, wet tongues. Overhead, the moon gleams unnaturally bright in the sky. You have a curious feeling you are not alone...
name: Fog on the Bay
text: Locations on the same row are connected to one another. 強制 - When this agenda advances: Move all doom on it to the next agenda.

back_flavor: Suddenly, you are ambushed by more of the repulsive hybrid creatures than you can possibly fend off. Cold, scaled hands grab your arms and pin them behind your back. The next thing you know, a sack is thrown over your head, obscuring your vision. You struggle in vain against your captors, but you are outnumbered and outmatched. "Take them below," a croaking voice commands. "They must learn the consequences of trespassing on sacred ground."
back_text: 每位調查員 is captured. Place each of their keys on Holding Cells. If Oceiros Marsh is in play, set him aside, out of play. 將放在一邊的每張Taken Captive into the encounter deck. Reveal the Lighthouse Basement. 將Sunken Grotto (Lower Depths) into play directly below Sunken Grotto (Upper Depths) and Sunken Grotto (Final Depths) into play directly below Sunken Grotto (Lower Depths). 然後，將random set-aside 潮水通道地點 into play until there are exactly 4 locations on each row, except for the row with the Lantern Room. (See Campaign Guide for diagram.) Advance the act directly to act 3a (do not resolve act 2b).
flavor: The Order knows you’re here. You have little time to spare - you have to find the way into their lair before they mobilize to capture you!
name: Unchanging as the Sea
text: Locations on the same row are connected to one another. 強制 - When an investigator is captured: Advance this agenda. 強制 - When this agenda advances: Move all doom on it to the next agenda.

back_flavor: Familiar, heavy breathing echoes across the slick rocks of the caverns and the stone walls of the lighthouse. You duck behind some cover as you hear footsteps approaching. Then comes the loud creaking and slamming of a heavy metal door, followed by a telltale click that stops your heart dead. Someone has sealed the exit to the lighthouse above...
back_text: Search all out-of-play areas for Oceiros Marsh and spawn him in the Sunken Grotto (Upper Depths). Remove each [[Falcon Point]]地點 from the game (or add them to the victory display if they have 勝利X and no clues on them)。Move each enemy and investigator at those locations to Sunken Grotto (Upper Depths). Each other card at those locations is discarded. Find the 4 bottommost locations that can have their flood levels increased. Increase each of their flood levels.
flavor: A wave of cold familiarity washes over you as you see the water level starting to rise throughout the tunnels. The tide is rolling in. If you aren’t quick, there won’t be much left here to investigate. Luckily, you still have a way out should the tide rise too quickly...
name: The Tide Rises
text: Locations on the same row are connected to one another.

back_text: Find the 4 bottommost locations that can have their flood levels increased. Increase each of their flood levels. If you cannot, proceed to (→結局3)。 否則，flip this agenda back over and continue playing.
flavor: The crash of waves on the shoreline echoes through the porous tunnels underneath the lighthouse. Your pulse pounds in your ears as you struggle to stay ahead of the water.
name: Terror at Falcon Point
text: Oceiros Marsh gets +2 [per_investigator] health. Locations on the same row are connected to one another. (Beware - the scenario may not end when this agenda advances, but the tide will continue to rise...)

back_flavor:
As you tiptoe through the old, timeworn structure, you hear muffled conversation from within the small cottage attached to the lighthouse. You press your ear upon a nearby wall and stand perfectly still, your heart racing.
"Find them," a deep, croaking voice orders. "Do not let them reach the grotto. The Order's secrets must be preserved."
"Yes, Oceiros," a few quiet voices reply in unison. You wait until the sound of footsteps has faded before you resume your investigation. It looks like your hunch was right. Oceiros is here!
back_text: 生成放在一邊的Oceiros Marsh enemy in Lighthouse Keeper's Cottage, exhausted. Place the set-aside blue key on him. 將放在一邊的每張Worth His Salt into the encounter deck. 將the set-aside Lighthouse Basement location into play directly below Lighthouse Stairwell. Advance the agenda directly to agenda 2a (do not resolve agenda 1b).
flavor: All signs point to this lighthouse being a base of operations for the 達貢密教. There’s not much left of Innsmouth to investigate, so this is your best chance to find answers. What exactly is the Order up to? You must find out before they realize you’re here...
name: The Lighthouse
text: 目標 - Spend the requisite number of clues before the agenda advances.

back_flavor: You use Oceiros's key to open the basement door of the lighthouse, expecting to find a small stone cellar. What you find instead is a network of flooded caverns extending deep into the cliffside of Falcon Point, perhaps even below sea level. You were right to come here - who knows what secrets the Order keeps here, away from prying eyes?
back_text: If Oceiros Marsh is in play, 將其加入勝利牌區。 將Sunken Grotto (Lower Depths) into play directly below Sunken Grotto (Upper Depths) and Sunken Grotto (Final Depths) into play directly below Sunken Grotto (Lower Depths). 然後，將random set-aside 潮水通道地點 into play until there are exactly 4 locations on each row, except for the row with the Lantern Room. (See Campaign Guide for diagram.) 將放在一邊的每張Taken Captive into the encounter deck. Advance the agenda directly to agenda 3a (do not resolve agenda 2b).
flavor: Falcon Point contains many secrets the Order does not wish you to know. Perhaps dealing with Oceiros will open the way.
name: Finding the Path
text: 目標 - If an investigator enters Lighthouse Basement before the agenda advances, 推進場景。

back_text:
If at least 1 investigator resigned from the Moon Room:
The underwater tunnels seem to go on forever, stretching into murk-ridden eddies. Dark salt water crashes against the glass helmet of your suit. After what feels like an eternity, you burst into the cold evening air, chilled to the bone. You pull the heavy suit off, piece by piece, the moment you reach the shore.
(→結局1) If 每位調查員 who resigned did so from the Falcon Point Gatehouse:
You flee into the lonely woods, panting for air. Somehow, you've escaped the denizens of the deep once more.
(→結局2)
flavor: Deep below the lighthouse is a web of tunnels filled with information pertaining to the Order’s activities. You must learn what you can before escaping.
name: Worshippers of the Deep
text: 強制 - At the end of the investigation phase: 每位調查員 at a fully flooded location must either 受到3點傷害 or move to the location directly below their location. 目標 - If each undefeated investigator has resigned, 推進場景。 (Hint - You may wish to find what you came for before you leave this place. The black and red keys represent the objects you need the most.)

back_flavor: Thick fog obscures your approach as you climb the trail leading to Falcon Point. With any luck, the lighthouse will be abandoned... but luck hasn’t been on your side as of late.
back_text: Falcon Point Gatehouse cannot be fully flooded.
name: Falcon Point Gatehouse
text: Falcon Point Gatehouse cannot be fully flooded. [action]：撤退。You head back into the woods, leaving the lighthouse and its mysteries behind. If you control the black or red keys, place each one you control on the current act.

back_flavor: The heavy door leading into the lighthouse is already ajar. Somebody has been here recently...
back_text: Lighthouse Stairwell cannot be fully flooded.
name: Lighthouse Stairwell
text:
Lighthouse Stairwell cannot be fully flooded.
[free] If there are any [[遺物]] story assets currently set aside: Add 1 of them to your hand.

back_flavor: At the very top of the stairwell, a narrow wooden door warped by rain damage blocks your way to the lantern room atop the lighthouse.
name: Lantern Room
text: Lantern Room cannot be flooded. 強制 - After Lantern Room is revealed: Place the set-aside white key on it.

back_flavor: The sharp cliffside juts over the Innsmouth coast. Dark waves crash against the jagged rocks. A fall from here would certainly be deadly.
back_text: Falcon Point Cliffside cannot be fully flooded.
name: Falcon Point Cliffside
text: Falcon Point Cliffside cannot be fully flooded. [free] If 你控制了白色鑰匙：：Using the white key, you peer out into the dark, stormy horizon, and something sparks in your memories. 閱讀劇本手冊的記憶閃回XII in the Campaign Guide.

back_flavor: The cottage next to the lighthouse is in shambles. It’s a wonder the door hasn’t already fallen off its hinges. Beyond, the building’s interior smells of fish and mold.
back_text: Lighthouse Keeper's Cottage cannot be fully flooded.
name: Lighthouse Keeper's Cottage
text: Lighthouse Keeper's Cottage cannot be fully flooded. 強制 - After Lighthouse Keeper's Cottage is revealed: Place the set-aside yellow key on it.

back_flavor: A thick padlock bars your way into what you suspect is a small cellar below the lighthouse.
back_text: The door leading into the basement of the lighthouse is locked tight. You cannot enter this location unless you control the blue key.
flavor: Well, that's certainly not a cellar.
name: Sunken Grotto
text: [free] Investigators at this location spend 1 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Look at the revealed side of a 潮水通道 location on this row.

back_flavor: Rickety wooden stairways cut through the crust of the cliffside, leading deeper underground.
name: Sunken Grotto
text: [free] Investigators at this location spend 1 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Look at the revealed side of a 潮水通道 location on this row.

back_flavor: Rickety wooden stairways cut through the crust of the cliffside, leading deeper underground.

text: [free] Investigators at this location spend 1 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Look at the revealed side of a 潮水通道 location on this row.

back_flavor: 這裡的空氣寒冷刺骨，除了水滴在粗糙石面上的輕聲之外，萬籟俱寂。你打了個寒顫，繼續向前……
name: Shrine to Hydra
text: Clues cannot be discovered from Shrine to Hydra except by investigating. While an investigator at Shrine to Hydra controls the green key, Shrine to Hydra gets -3 shroud. 強制 - After Shrine to Hydra is revealed: Place the set-aside red key on it.

back_flavor: 這裡的空氣寒冷刺骨，除了水滴在粗糙石面上的輕聲之外，萬籟俱寂。你打了個寒顫，繼續向前……
name: Deep One Nursery
text: [free] If you control the purple色鑰匙：You compare the purple key to the oversized eggs littering the flooded chamber and recall something. 閱讀劇本手冊的記憶閃回XIII in the Campaign Guide. 強制 - After Deep One Nursery is revealed: Increase its flood level.

name: The Moon Room
text: [action] If The Moon Room is unflooded：撤退。You don one of the empty diving suits and dive into the reflecting pool. If you control the black or red keys, place each one you control on the current act. 強制 - After The Moon Room is revealed: Increase its flood level.

back_flavor: 這裡的空氣寒冷刺骨，除了水滴在粗糙石面上的輕聲之外，萬籟俱寂。你打了個寒顫，繼續向前……
name: Sunken Archives
text: Clues cannot be discovered at Sunken Archives while it is flooded. 強制 - After Sunken Archives is revealed: 其完全淹沒。 Place the set-aside black key on it.

back_flavor: 這裡的空氣寒冷刺骨，除了水滴在粗糙石面上的輕聲之外，萬籟俱寂。你打了個寒顫，繼續向前……
name: Pump Room
text: [action]：檢定[intellect](2)或[agility](2)。如果你檢定成功，choose two locations. Decrease the flood level of one location and increase the flood level of the other (if you succeed by 2 or more, you may instead choose just one location and decrease its flood level).

name: Captured!
text:
The first time an investigator is captured, read the following:
You are bound and dragged deep underground, then thrown into a sealed prison cell, surrounded on all sides by dripping stone walls. Your cries fall on deaf ears as your captor's footsteps fade into the distance.
Remove the captured investigator from their location and return each asset in that investigator's hand slots to their hand. Turn that investigator's mini-card sideways to indicate that they have been captured. Captured investigators cannot move, fight, or be engaged. Flip this story card over to its "Holding Cells" side and 將it放置入場。 It is not on any existing row or column, and is only connected to Sunken Grotto locations through its connection icons. Place the captured investigator in Holding Cells. From now on, whenever an investigator is captured, resolve this same effect (return each asset in their hand slots to their hand, turn their mini-card sideways, and place them in Holding Cells).

name: Holding Cells
text:
Holding Cells cannot be flooded. 
Enemies cannot enter or spawn at Holding Cells (if one would spawn here, spawn it at any Sunken Grotto instead).
[action]：檢定[combat](3) to break the bars or [agility](3) to pick the locks. If you control the yellow key, this test automatically succeeds. 如果你檢定成功，free an investigator who is captured here.

name: Oceiros Marsh
text: 獵手。反擊。 Oceiros Marsh gets +2 evade while his location is flooded. 強制 - After Oceiros Marsh is successfully evaded: For each point you succeeded by, take control of 1 key on him. 強制 - After Oceiros Marsh attacks you during the enemy phase: You are captured. Place each of your keys on Oceiros Marsh.
traits: 類人. 深潛者. 混血. 精英

name: Deep One Nursemaid
text: 冷漠。反擊。 While Deep One Nursemaid is unengaged, each other [[深潛者]]敵人 at its location or connecting locations gets +1 fight and +1 evade. 強制 - After Deep One Nursemaid與你交戰後：抽取遭遇牌堆頂的卡牌. That card loses 湧動。
traits: 類人. 怪物. 深潛者

name: Deep One Hatchling
text: 湧動。 強制 - After you engage Deep One Hatchling: Either 失去一次行動 or it attacks you. 強制 - After you defeat Deep One Hatchling: Move the nearest ready, unengaged [[深潛者]]敵人 once toward your location. That enemy loses aloof during this movement.

name: Hideous Lullaby
text: 顯現 - If there are no [[深潛者]] enemies in play, Hideous Lullaby 獲得湧動。 否則，find the [[深潛者]]敵人 with the highest fight value. 檢定[willpower](X)，其中X為that enemy's fight value. 如果你檢定失敗，受到2點恐懼。

name: Kiss of Brine
text: 顯現 - 檢定[combat](2)。Increase the difficulty of this test by 2 if you are at a flooded location. 如果你檢定失敗, 受到1點傷害 and 將Kiss of Brine放置入場，放到你的威脅區域。 You cannot gain resources or draw cards. 強制 - 當敵軍階段結束時：Discard Kiss of Brine.

name: Totality
text: 顯現 - 檢定[willpower](3)。如果你檢定失敗, 將Totality放置入場，放到你的威脅區域。 強制 - After you enter a flooded location: 受到1點恐懼。 強制 - At the end of your turn: Discard Totality.

name: Worth His Salt
text: 顯現 - Attach to Oceiros Marsh, even if he is in the victory display. 強制 - After Oceiros Marsh moves via his hunter keyword, if he is unengaged: Resolve his hunter keyword again. He cannot attack this phase. (每輪限制一次)。 強制 - When Oceiros Marsh attacks: This attack deals +1 damage and +1點恐懼. Discard this card.

flavor: You are hurled into the dark cell and hear the heart‑stopping click of the lock closing behind you.
name: Taken Captive
text: 顯現 - 檢定[agility](4)。如果你檢定失敗, you are captured; place each of your keys on Holding Cells.
